name: The Trainwreck
description:
Cross a dangerous track of land while keeping your precious piece of machinery running. Also, you better watch out for invaders.

This world is run by coal and nothing else matters. Grab your coal magnet and get ready to depart!

Controls:

A/S - Rotate

W/S - Move Shovel Up/Down

Mouse - Move Shovel

Left Click - Stab

Credits:

Adam Badura - 3D Modeling / 3D Animations

Andrei Mataoanu - Programing / 3D Modeling

Radu-Constantin Matusa - Programming

Tomi Faludi - Programming

WebGL version coming soon hopefully.
